channel.title: Security and Compliance on Agilebase docs
channel.description: Recent content in Security and Compliance on Agilebase docs

item.title: Policies
item.description: Backups Data backups are performed across the stack of technology, from server down to databases and file storage. Database backups are taken daily and hosted in the European Union by Amazon. Older backups transition to Amazon Glacier and are kept for 200 days - this allows a balance between the practical necessity of allowing rollbacks to a certain point in time, whilst not storing data for an unnecessarily long period, to comply with the GDPR.
